The claim originated from a report by Lo: which stated that major corporations were donating large sums of money to Black Lives Matter.
The companies mentioned in the claim: including Bank of America, PepsiCo, Walmart, Apple, and Comcast, have pledged support for racial equality initiatives but have not specifically mentioned Black Lives Matter as a beneficiary.
Lou Dobbs issued a correction the follow: acknowledging that the large amounts of money were not for Black Lives Matter but rather pledges of investments to address economic and racial inequality.
